item.description:
For all you socially mobile singles- Meet us at the non-city slicker Waltham Westin Hotel to raise a glass for liberty and the 21st amendment (11 days late, but who's counting) at age 73 at the cash bar and munchies on the club (that means come early). Great conversation, and merriment guaranteed (by Mark) to all those who come!

Free parking Baby! Life in is good in the burbs...
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be loud, and proud, we're here, we're...oh right, no amendment yet for that one...you can ask, but we can't tell.
item.name: "After Work" for those that do; or a reason to drink and socialize or vice versa
